notes.title: add more notes
notes.text: I should probably add some new notes..

notes.title: Continue with Infinite Notes app
notes.text:
After finishing the Complete Intro to React v3 course by Brian Holt on Frontend Masters I should probably make an app by myself to practice.
 
 Practice makes perfect, as they say.

notes.title: React JS
notes.text:
A JavaScript library for building user interfaces
 
 React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes.
